H0.text: The Welsh Highland Railway runs between Porthmadog and which town or city. Bangor

H1.text: The Welsh Highland Railway runs between Porthmadog and which town or city. Blaenau Ffestiniog

H2.text: The Welsh Highland Railway runs between Porthmadog and which town or city. Conwy

H3.text: The Welsh Highland Railway runs between Porthmadog and which town or city. Caernarfon

A4.text: The Welsh Highland Railway runs from Caernarfon to Porthmadog.
